snippet.title: Return from Core - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Return from Core is a subterranean sandbox survival RPG developed by Tanxun Studio. Players will search the catacombs of Earth’s core after tragedy befalls the planet, forcing humanity to retreat beneath the surface. Explore the core’s caverns infested with crawling critters while searching for resources to craft tools, equipment, and build a base. Seek the friendship of powerful allies to eventually aid the quest to one day return to the world above. Return from Core is available now in Steam Early Access on PC.

#IGN #Gaming #ReturnFromCore
